data.name: OpenMode
desc: These are the possible values for OpenCommandArgument.Mode.

items.name: ALL
lines: open a folder, include all children in result set (documents and folders).

items.name: FOLDERS
lines: open a folder, include only children, that are folders, in result set.

items.name: DOCUMENTS
lines: open a folder, include only children, that are documents, in result set.

items.name: DOCUMENT
lines: There are no special requirements for data access sharing.
Note: There must be a data sink supplied in the OpenCommandArgument struct, if this value is set. This sink will be used by the content implementation to supply the document data.

items.name: DOCUMENT_SHARE_DENY_NONE
lines: Allow shared read and write access.
Note: There must be a data sink supplied in the OpenCommandArgument struct, if this value is set. This sink will be used by the content implementation to supply the document data.

items.name: DOCUMENT_SHARE_DENY_WRITE
lines: Note: There must be a data sink supplied in the OpenCommandArgument struct, if this value is set. This sink will be used by the content implementation to supply the document data.
